pages.text: $(li)Zombified Piglin are neutral creatures that can be found over the Nether.$(br)$(li)These creatures will become hostile to you when it or another nearby Zombified Piglin is attacked.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/rotten_flesh)Rotten Flesh$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_nugget)Gold Nuggets$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_ingot)Gold Ingots$(/l).
